title: Vivino Founder on Wine App Startup
itunes:title: Vivino Founder on Wine App Startup
description:
Heini Zachariassen, Founder of Vivino, talks about how his wine app startup has raised $155 million to expand business.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
